title:
Pedal Position Double Signal, All Petrol (MY 2002,
MY 2003 and MY 2004)

steps.text:
Depress the accelerator pedal quickly down to the
limit stop, keep it down for approximately half a second and then
release it again.

Download Setup file (the Tech 32 uses only Setup
files, no reference curves).

Depress the accelerator pedal quickly down to the
limit stop, keep it down for approximately half a second and then
release it again.
